WRITING.TEXT: Thank you so much for this. I really really needed to hear this today from someone who understands because I do deserve better than starving myself, and I truly want to get healthy again even though it's incredibly hard.

WRITING.TITLE: Quest protein powder sale will begin at 10 a.m. PST Thursday, March 12th and end 10 a.m. PST Friday, March 13th.
WRITING.TEXT: Quest Protein Powder will be 25% off with FREE shipping (U.S. sale only) for one day only on their site. Two canisters maximum per purchase.

WRITING.TITLE: What is the best candy store in Madison?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm not just talking chocolate, but old fashioned candies such as hard candy, salt water taffy, and fudges.

Yeah, I'm for sure struggling to make that transition. It just seems wrong to eat all of this food. It seems like too much even though I know that rationally, it isn't given the fact I'm quite tall and fairly active.
